underlying_goal: Fix an ImportError for google.cloud.pubsub_v1 in a Databricks notebook environment, and then consolidate the linting approach for notebook anti-patterns
friction_detail: Claude's initial fix (# MAGIC %pip install) didn't fully solve the problem; user found the actual working solution (%restart_python) themselves, and then had to redirect Claude away from an overly complex linter regex approach.
brief_summary: User needed to fix a Databricks notebook ImportError; Claude identified part of the issue but the user found the final fix themselves, then asked Claude to simplify the linter approach which was in progress when the session ended.
